description:
My place is close to Katz deli. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

The Neighborhood:
The East Village is the hottest neighborhood in Manhattan. FIlled with the greatest food destinations and nightlife. Countless restaurants at your doorstep and delivery of just about everything on one of the nights you want to just stay in. The apartment is perfectly situated and within walking distance of SoHo, Union Square, the West Village, Chinatown, Little Italy and the Lower East Side.

Grocery Stores:
Whole Foods, Met Foods and Associated Supermarket are all within three blocks. There is also a great bodega on the corner just across the street which delivers 24 hours a day.

Getting around
name: Charming NY 1 bedroom in the heart of NY
review: We had a great weekend stay at Rj's place. We were able to leave our bags since we arrived earlier than expected without a problem. The apartment was very clean and in a great location in the center of the Lower East Side. It felt like an excellent home base for our weekend trip to the city.
